blogPost.excerpt: Introducing Accountable 2.0 - the all new way to become HIPAA compliant. Designed to simplify the entire process of achieving and managing HIPAA compliance, from HIPAA training to policy management. And did we mention $100k HIPAA breach guarantee?
blogPost.body: Introducing Accountable 2.0 - the all new way to become HIPAA compliant. Designed to simplify the entire process of achieving and managing HIPAA compliance, from HIPAA training to policy management. And did we mention $100k HIPAA breach guarantee?
blogPost.title: Accountable 2.0 - HIPAA compliance management platform and $100k guarantee
blogPost.author: Kevin Henry

localize.description: 引入负责任的2.0-成为HIPAA兼容的全新方式。旨在简化实现和管理HIPAA合规性的整个流程，从HIPAA培训到策略管理。我们有没有提到10万美元的HIPAA违约担保？
localize.tagline: HIPAA合规管理平台和10万美元担保

localize.description: 引入負責任的2.0-成爲HIPAA兼容的全新方式。旨在簡化實現和管理HIPAA合規性的整個流程，從HIPAA培訓到策略管理。我們有沒有提到10萬美元的HIPAA違約擔保？
localize.tagline: HIPAA合規管理平臺和10萬美元擔保

previous.excerpt: PrivacyGrader.com provides an online assessment within 24 hours that measures how well a business’s website upholds consumer data protection laws, assesses privacy functionality, and highlights potential gaps and issues with the site.
previous.title: PrivacyGrader - Analyzing a website's privacy & compliance in under 24 hours

localize.description: PrivacyGrader.com在24小时内提供在线评估，衡量企业网站维护消费者数据保护法的程度，评估隐私功能，并突出网站的潜在差距和问题。
localize.tagline: 在24小时内分析网站的隐私和合规性

localize.description: PrivacyGrader.com在24小時內提供在線評估，衡量企業網站維護消費者數據保護法的程度，評估隱私功能，並突出網站的潛在差距和問題。
localize.tagline: 在24小時內分析網站的隱私和合規性

next.excerpt: Sometimes words just aren't enough... on Monet, send a drawing to make a new connection. :~)
next.title: Monet - Draw your way to love, to friends, and to a good time.

localize.description: 有时候光靠语言是不够的……在Monet上，发送绘图以建立新连接。：~)
localize.tagline: 画出你通往爱情、朋友和快乐时光的道路。

localize.description: 有時候光靠語言是不夠的……在Monet上，發送繪圖以建立新連接。：~)
localize.tagline: 畫出你通往愛情、朋友和快樂時光的道路。
